name: Death by Begonia Prologue
description:
After a ten-year absence, Riley Airhart returns to their hometown of Begonia, Arkansas and meets up with old friends, only to find that a serial killer has been plaguing the town ever since Riley disappeared.

Death by Begonia is a Southern gothic murder-mystery/romance visual novel developed by Paper Moon Studios. Part 1, Regression (Aidan's Route) will release May 13. Rekindle old flames, explore Begonia, and solve the mystery at the heart of the town's serial murders.

[NOTE: Mac and hopefully browser support coming soon!]
